common.title: Rednote
common.description: Generate beautiful XHS cards with AI
common.examplesDescription: See how other users create content cards with our AI
common.featuresDescription: Providing intelligent and efficient creation experience based on advanced AI technology
common.feature1Description: Quickly generate engaging content with AI models
common.feature2Description: Automatically optimize content format for better appeal
common.feature3Description: Support various content types for different needs
common.feature4Description: Ensure your content is safe and secure
common.guideDescription: Two modes to meet different creation needs
common.step1Description: Enter your topic in the input box, e.g., '10-minute Quick Breakfast'
common.step2Description: Click 'AI Create' button to generate original content
common.step3Description: Modify the generated content and adjust details
common.hotStep3Description: AI analyzes and generates original content
common.brandDescription: An AI-powered XHS content creation assistant, making content creation easier and more engaging.

editor.topicTip: AI will create an engaging XHS note based on your title.
editor.topicTip2: Suggest entering specific topics, e.g., '10-minute Quick Breakfast' or 'Incredible Gadgets for Kids'
editor.generatingTip2: Please enter the title first, AI will help you expand it into a hot post
editor.hotPostTip2: Please paste the content of the successful post
editor.hotPostTip3: Suggest providing more detailed reference content for better generation results
editor.hotPostTip5: Keywords should not exceed 3 to ensure content focus
editor.hotOriginTitleTip: Paste the content of the successful post you want to reference
editor.hotKeywordsTip: For example: weight loss recipe, low-calorie, healthy
editor.hotAddInfoTip: Add unique insights, personal experiences, or data
editor.previewGenerateTip1: Please enter the configuration information on the left
editor.previewGenerateTip2: Then click the button to generate content
editor.pricingSubtitle: Choose the plan that best suits your needs
editor.pricingProDesc: Ideal for content creators and brands
editor.pricingQRCodeDesc: Due to increasing users, we appreciate your support!
